verses.verse: Now there was a man <WH376> of Benjamin, <WH1144> whose name <WH8034> was Kish, <WH7027> the son <WH1121> of Abiel, <WH22> the son <WH1121> of Zeror, <WH6872> the son <WH1121> of Bechorath, <WH1064> the son <WH1121> of Aphiah, <WH647> a Benjamite, <WH1145> a mighty <WH1368> man <WH376> of power. <WH2428>

And he had <WH1961> a son, <WH1121> whose name <WH8034> was Saul, <WH7586> a choice <WH970> young <WH970> man, and a goodly: <WH2896> and there was not among the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> a goodlier <WH2896> person <WH376> than he: from his shoulders <WH7926> and upward <WH4605> he was higher <WH1364> than any <WH3605> of the people. <WH5971>

And the asses <WH860> of Kish <WH7027> Saul's <WH7586> father <WH1> were lost. <WH6> And Kish <WH7027> said <WH559> to Saul <WH7586> his son, <WH1121> Take <WH3947> now <WH4994> one <WH259> of the servants <WH5650> with you, and arise, <WH6965> go <WH3212> seek <WH1245> the asses. <WH860>

And he passed <WH5674> through mount <WH2022> Ephraim, <WH669> and passed <WH5674> through the land <WH776> of Shalisha, <WH8031> but they found <WH4672> them not: then they passed <WH5674> through the land <WH776> of Shalim, <WH8171> and there they were not: and he passed <WH5674> through the land <WH776> of the Benjamites, <WH1145> but they found <WH4672> them not.

And when they were come <WH935> to the land <WH776> of Zuph, <WH6689> Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> to his servant <WH5288> that was with him, Come, <WH3212> and let us return; <WH7725> lest <WH6435> my father <WH1> leave <WH2308> caring for the asses, <WH860> and take thought <WH1672> for us.

And he said <WH559> to him, Behold <WH2009> now, <WH4994> there is in this <WH2063> city <WH5892> a man <WH376> of God, <WH430> and he is an honorable <WH3513> man; <WH376> all <WH3605> that he said <WH1696> comes <WH935> surely to pass: now <WH6258> let us go <WH3212> thither; <WH8033> peradventure <WH194> he can show <WH5046> us our way <WH1870> that we should go. <WH1980>

Then said <WH559> Saul <WH7586> to his servant, <WH5288> But, behold, <WH2009> if we go, <WH3212> what <WH4100> shall we bring <WH935> the man? <WH376> for the bread <WH3899> is spent <WH235> in our vessels, <WH3627> and there is not a present <WH8670> to bring <WH935> to the man <WH376> of God: <WH430> what <WH4100> have we?

And the servant <WH5288> answered <WH6030> Saul <WH7586> again, <WH3254> and said, <WH559> Behold, <WH2009> I have <WH4672> here at hand <WH3027> the fourth <WH7253> part of a shekel <WH8255> of silver: <WH3701> that will I give <WH5414> to the man <WH376> of God, <WH430> to tell <WH5046> us our way. <WH1870>

(Beforetime <WH6440> in Israel, <WH3478> when a man <WH376> went <WH3212> to inquire <WH1875> of God, <WH430> thus <WH3541> he spoke, <WH559> Come, <WH3212> and let us go <WH3212> to the seer: <WH7200> for he that is now <WH3117> called a Prophet <WH5030> was beforetime <WH6440> called <WH7121> a Seer. <WH7200>)

Then said <WH559> Saul <WH7586> to his servant, <WH5288> Well <WH2896> said; <WH1697> come, <WH3212> let us go. <WH3212> So they went <WH3212> to the city <WH5892> where <WH834> <WH8033> the man <WH376> of God <WH430> was.

And as they went <WH5927> up the hill <WH4608> to the city, <WH5892> they found <WH4672> young <WH5291> maidens <WH5291> going <WH3318> out to draw <WH7579> water, <WH4325> and said <WH559> to them, Is the seer <WH7200> here? <WH2088>

And they answered <WH6030> them, and said, <WH559> He is; behold, <WH2009> he is before <WH6440> you: make haste <WH4116> now, <WH6258> for he came <WH935> to day <WH3117> to the city; <WH5892> for there is a sacrifice <WH2077> of the people <WH5971> to day <WH3117> in the high <WH1116> place:

As soon as you be come <WH935> into the city, <WH5892> you shall straightway <WH3651> find <WH4672> him, before <WH2962> he go <WH5927> up to the high <WH1116> place to eat: <WH398> for the people <WH5971> will not eat <WH398> until <WH5704> he come, <WH935> because <WH3588> he does bless <WH1288> the sacrifice; <WH2077> and afterwards <WH310> <WH3651> they eat <WH398> that be bidden. <WH7121> Now <WH6258> therefore get <WH5927> you up; for about this time <WH3117> you shall find <WH4672> him.

And they went <WH5927> up into <WH8432> the city: <WH5892> and when they were come <WH935> into the city, <WH5892> behold, <WH2009> Samuel <WH8050> came <WH3318> out against <WH7125> them, for to go <WH5927> up to the high <WH1116> place.
Now the LORD <WH3068> had told <WH1540> Samuel <WH8050> in his ear <WH241> a day <WH3117> before <WH6440> Saul <WH7586> came, <WH935> saying, <WH559>

To morrow <WH4279> about this time <WH6256> I will send <WH7971> you a man <WH376> out of the land <WH776> of Benjamin, <WH1144> and you shall anoint <WH4886> him to be captain <WH5057> over <WH5921> my people <WH5971> Israel, <WH3478> that he may save <WH3467> my people <WH5971> out of the hand <WH3027> of the Philistines: <WH6430> for I have looked <WH7200> on my people, <WH5971> because <WH3588> their cry <WH6818> is come <WH935> to me.

And when Samuel <WH8050> saw <WH7200> Saul, <WH7586> the LORD <WH3068> said <WH6030> to him, Behold <WH2009> the man <WH376> whom <WH834> I spoke <WH559> to you of! this <WH2088> same <WH2088> shall reign <WH6113> over my people. <WH5971>
Then Saul <WH7586> drew near <WH5066> to Samuel <WH8050> in the gate, <WH8179> and said, <WH559> Tell <WH5046> me, I pray <WH4994> you, where <WH335> <WH2088> the seer's <WH7200> house <WH1004> is.

And Samuel <WH8050> answered <WH6030> Saul, <WH7586> and said, <WH559> I am the seer: <WH7200> go <WH5927> up before <WH6440> me to the high <WH1116> place; for you shall eat <WH398> with me to day, <WH3117> and to morrow <WH1242> I will let you go, <WH7971> and will tell <WH5046> you all <WH3605> that is in your heart. <WH3824>

And as for your asses <WH860> that were lost <WH6> three <WH7969> days <WH3117> ago, <WH3117> set <WH7760> not your mind <WH3820> on them; for they are found. <WH4672> And on whom <WH4310> is all <WH3605> the desire <WH2532> of Israel? <WH3478> Is it not on you, and on all <WH3605> your father's <WH1> house? <WH1004>

And Saul <WH7586> answered <WH6030> and said, <WH559> Am not I a Benjamite, <WH1145> of the smallest <WH6996> of the tribes <WH7626> of Israel? <WH3478> and my family <WH4940> the least <WH6810> of all <WH3605> the families <WH4940> of the tribe <WH7626> of Benjamin? <WH1144> why <WH4100> then speak <WH1696> you so <WH1697> to me?

And Samuel <WH8050> took <WH3947> Saul <WH7586> and his servant, <WH5288> and brought <WH935> them into the parlor, <WH3957> and made <WH5414> them sit <WH5414> in the most chief <WH7218> place <WH4725> among them that were bidden, <WH7121> which were about thirty <WH7970> persons. <WH376>
And Samuel <WH8050> said <WH559> to the cook, <WH2876> Bring <WH5414> the portion <WH4490> which <WH834> I gave <WH5414> you, of which <WH834> I said <WH559> to you, Set <WH7760> it by you.

And the cook <WH2876> took <WH7311> up the shoulder, <WH7785> and that which was on it, and set <WH7760> it before <WH6440> Saul. <WH7586> And Samuel said, <WH559> Behold <WH2009> that which is left! <WH7604> set <WH7760> it before <WH6440> you, and eat: <WH398> for to this time <WH4150> has it been kept <WH8104> for you since I said, <WH559> I have invited <WH7121> the people. <WH5971> So Saul <WH7586> did eat <WH398> with Samuel <WH8050> that day. <WH3117>
And when they were come <WH3381> down <WH3381> from the high <WH1116> place into the city, <WH5892> Samuel communed <WH1696> with Saul <WH7586> on the top <WH1406> of the house.

And they arose <WH7925> early: <WH7925> and it came <WH1961> to pass about the spring <WH5927> of the day, <WH7837> that Samuel <WH8050> called <WH7121> Saul <WH7586> to the top <WH1406> of the house, saying, <WH559> Up, that I may send <WH7971> you away. And Saul <WH7586> arose, <WH6965> and they went <WH3318> out both <WH8147> of them, he and Samuel, <WH8050> abroad. <WH2351>

And as they were going <WH3381> down <WH3381> to the end <WH7097> of the city, <WH5892> Samuel <WH8050> said <WH559> to Saul, <WH7586> Bid <WH559> the servant <WH5288> pass <WH5674> on before <WH6440> us, (and he passed <WH5674> on), but stand <WH5975> you still a while, <WH3117> that I may show <WH8085> you the word <WH1697> of God. <WH430>
